Hey, I'm Verun, CEO and co-founder of
Windsurf. So, Windsurf is an AI powered
ID uh that provides agentic capabilities
that enables developers and

So, I graduated from MIT in 2017 and
after that I actually worked at an
autonomous vehicle company in Mountain
View called Nuro. there sort of got an
early taste of what deep learning could

needed to control more of the
experience, especially as these models

was why we decided to build our own ID,
which was Windsurf. That has taken off
very quickly as well.
